function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Enabling the notification function of Scopus to receive weekly publication updates","Impact":"Adding 7 additional papers to the database","Mitigation":"Careful review and verification of the added papers","Technologies":"Database management software for automatic verification","People":"Researchers, database managers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Reviewing selected papers in detail and extracting necessary information","Impact":"Error in data collection or analysis","Mitigation":"Double checking and verification of the collected data","Technologies":"Data analysis software for validation","People":"Co-authors, lead author, researchers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
